name: Jellyfin

description:
💎 Egg: Jellyfin
⚙️ Version: 2.0
\u753 What it is: In short, you can have your own Netflix. Jellyfin allows for you to collect, manage and stream your media. Run the Jellyfin server on your system and get access to the leading free software entertainment system.
🐛 Bugs fixed/changelogs:\ no Now the Egg is not dependent on updates, everything is done by scripts, causes it to be better maintained.
• This is possibly its last version.
• Code is now cleaner.
• Docker updated.
⚠️ Attention: On first launch there will be a Select Server screen, delete the existing server there, and restart the page.
👑 Author: Ashu
👀 Check for updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update
apt upgrade -y
apt install -y curl wget unzip git tar ca-certificates jq fuse
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect%20(pt-BR)/Jellyfin/install.sh)
